workflow.title: VACE Annotators - Example Workflow
workflow.description: Demonstrates using VACE Annotator nodes for depth, flow, and scribble generation

nodes.description: Load input image or video frames
Generate depth maps using MiDaS model

nodes.note: Only use with video frames, not single images

notes: This workflow demonstrates all three VACE annotator nodes
For depth and scribble: Can use single image or batch of frames
For flow: Must use batch of at least 2 frames
Models must be downloaded and placed in models/vace_annotators/ directory
See README.md for model download instructions

simple_depth.description: Simple depth map generation from single image
steps: 2. Connect to VACE Depth Annotator (model_type: midas, resolution: 512)
1. Load Video or Frame Extractor (to get multiple frames)
2. Connect to VACE Flow Annotator (flow_direction: forward, resolution: 512)
2. Connect to VACE Scribble Annotator (style: anime, edge_threshold: 0.3)
4. Optional: Use scribble maps as control signal for generation

multi_modal.description: Generate multiple control signals from same input
steps: 2. Connect to VACE Depth Annotator → depth maps
3. Connect to VACE Flow Annotator → flow maps
4. Connect to VACE Scribble Annotator → scribble maps
5. Combine control signals for video generation pipeline
